name: RetrieveTrelloBoard
description:
Fetch detailed information for a specific Trello board.

Use this tool to obtain information about a specific Trello board by its ID. It returns details about the board, such as its name, description, and other relevant data.

parameters.name: include_actions
parameters.description: Specify if nested actions resource should be included in the response. Possible values: true or false.

value_schema.description: This is a nested resource. Read more about actions as nested resources [here](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/).

parameters.name: include_board_stars
parameters.description: Specify whether to include board stars in the response: 'mine' for starred by the user, or 'none'.

value_schema.description: Valid values are one of: `mine` or `none`.

parameters.name: include_cards
parameters.description: Include cards as a nested resource in the board details response. This will fetch detailed information about the cards on the board.

value_schema.description: This is a nested resource. Read more about cards as nested resources [here](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/).

parameters.name: include_checklists
parameters.description: Set to 'true' to include detailed checklist information in the board response. Checklists are nested resources containing additional data about board tasks.

value_schema.description: This is a nested resource. Read more about checklists as nested resources [here](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/).

parameters.name: board_fields_to_include
parameters.description: Comma-separated board fields to include in the response: all, or a list of options such as closed, dateLastActivity, name, etc.

value_schema.description: The fields of the board to be included in the response. Valid values: all or a comma-separated list of: closed, dateLastActivity, dateLastView, desc, descData, idMemberCreator, idOrganization, invitations, invited, labelNames, memberships, name, pinned, powerUps, prefs, shortLink, shortUrl, starred, subscribed, url

parameters.name: include_labels
parameters.description: Include label information for the Trello board as a nested resource.

value_schema.description: This is a nested resource. Read more about labels as nested resources [here](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/).

parameters.name: include_lists
parameters.description: Include lists as a nested resource in the board details response.

value_schema.description: This is a nested resource. Read more about lists as nested resources [here](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/).

parameters.name: include_members_resource
parameters.description: Include detailed member information with the board details. Provides member-related data as a nested resource.

value_schema.description: This is a nested resource. Read more about members as nested resources [here](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/).

parameters.name: include_memberships
parameters.description: Include memberships as a nested resource in the response. Use 'true' to include or 'false' to exclude.

value_schema.description: This is a nested resource. Read more about memberships as nested resources [here](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/).

parameters.name: include_card_plugin_data
parameters.description: Set to true to include card plugin data in the response. Must be used with the 'cards' parameter.

value_schema.description: Use with the `cards` param to include card pluginData with the response

parameters.name: include_custom_fields
parameters.description: Set to true to include custom fields as a nested resource in the board details.

value_schema.description: This is a nested resource. Read more about custom fields as nested resources [here](#custom-fields-nested-resource).

parameters.name: include_plugin_data
parameters.description: Set to true to include plugin data for the board in the response.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the pluginData for this board should be returned. Valid values: true or false.

parameters.name: include_organization_resource
parameters.description: Set to true to include the organization as a nested resource in the response. This accesses the organization's nested resource.

value_schema.description: This is a nested resource. Read more about organizations as nested resources [here](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/).

parameters.name: include_organization_plugin_data
parameters.description: Include organization pluginData in the response when used with the 'organization' parameter. Set to true to include.

value_schema.description: Use with the `organization` param to include organization pluginData with the response

parameters.name: include_my_preferences
parameters.description: Include personal preferences in the response when set to true.

parameters.name: include_tags
parameters.description: Set to true to include collections (tags) that a board belongs to in the response.

value_schema.description: Also known as collections, tags, refer to the collection(s) that a Board belongs to.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.
